meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Mongolia.
meanings.sent1: In Mongolia, you can buy many things with just one tughrik.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for tughriks at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The tughrik in my pocket felt like a tiny treasure.
meanings.sent4: His generosity was worth more than any tughrik.
meanings.sent5: The shiny tughrik glinted in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency equal to 100 möngö.
meanings.sent1: She saved up enough tughriks to buy a special gift.
meanings.sent2: The price was listed in both tughriks and dollars.
meanings.sent3: Finding a tughrik on the ground made her smile.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a stack of tughriks, adding up over time.
meanings.sent5: The tughrik jingled in his pocket as he walked.
